meanings.definition: A type of fastener used to secure papers together.
meanings.sent1: I used a few agrafes to hold my papers in place.
meanings.sent2: The office supply store sells agrafes in various sizes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the agrafes, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a row of agrafes, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The sound of agrafes clicking together filled the quiet room.

meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with a type of fastener.
meanings.sent1: She carefully agrafed the loose papers together.
meanings.sent2: Remember to agrafe the corners of the document before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The chef agrafed the pastry edges to create a beautiful design.
meanings.sent4: His words agrafed my attention, making me listen intently.
meanings.sent5: The team agrafed their friendship through shared experiences.

meanings.definition: The act of fastening or securing with a type of fastener.
meanings.sent1: The agrafing of the documents was done with precision.
meanings.sent2: His agrafing of the fabric showed his attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The agrafing of the necklace clasp took longer than expected.
meanings.sent4: The agrafing of the tent flaps kept the campers safe from the rain.
meanings.sent5: Her agrafing of the book pages made it easier to flip through.
